name: Lord of the Tachyon Galaxy
text: During the Battle Phase: Detach 1 material from your "Galaxy-Eyes" Xyz Monster (if you control a "Number C" monster, this card's activation and effect cannot be negated); shuffle all monsters your opponent controls Normal or Special Summoned this turn into the Deck. You can only activate 1 "Lord of the Tachyon Galaxy" per turn. If you control a "Galaxy-Eyes Tachyon Dragon" monster, you can activate this card from the hand.
